Package levels

Class Level

java.lang.Object
levels.Level
public class Level extends Object
Represents a game level.

    Constructs a Level object with the specified image.

    • getSpriteIndex

      public int getSpriteIndex(int x, int y)
      Retrieves the sprite index at the specified position in the level data array.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the sprite.
      y - The y-coordinate of the sprite.
      Returns:
      The index of the sprite at the specified position.
